Pre-Game Insights: Canada has registered their first T20 win against a test-playing nation in the ICC Menâ€™s T20 World Cup 2024.
Canada's win against Ireland was a historic one, showing the potential of Canadian cricket.
Aaron Johnson emphasized the importance of taking it stride and moving forward.
Pakistan has already dropped points to the USA and India in their opening two games, and a loss for them would eliminate them from the tournament.
A win for Canada would draw them level with the top two teams from Group A, India and USA, at four points.
Canada and Pakistan have only locked horns once, back in 2008, when the South Asian side secured a 35-run win in the T20 Canada.
Johnson believes that the wicket playing some tricks levels the playing field for Canada.
Others: Canada's victory over Ireland was a steady partnership of 75 runs in 63 balls between Nicholas Kirton and Shreyas Movva.
Breakthrough spells from Jeremy Gordon and Dillon Heyliger restricted Ireland 12 runs short.
The match between Canada and Pakistan will take place at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium on June 11, 2024.
